availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, laborer. Native of Ireland. Married to Rose Mullen McGinty in Floyd County, Indiana, on April 16, 1864. Father of John McGinty. Laborer in Louisville in 1861. Laborer in Louisville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States, (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 8, p. 113B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, KY, June 1863, p. 313.
Indiana Marriage Records, 1801-1952, Indiana Archives and Record Administration, Floyd County, Indiana, Marriage Records, 1853-1864, p. 472.
